name: Standard
description: Standard 5v5 plant/defuse gameplay with first to 24 rounds winning.

name: Swiftplay
description: Faster-paced best-of-nine format. Same gameplay as Standard but shorter matches.

name: Spike Rush
description: Best-of-seven mode with random weapons and power-up orbs. Quick and chaotic fun.

name: Deathmatch
description: Free-for-all combat to practice aim and warm up. First to 40 kills or highest kills in 9 minutes wins.

name: Escalation
description: Team-based mode progressing through weapon tiers. First team to complete all tiers wins.

name: Team Deathmatch
description: 5v5 team-based elimination mode. Work together to reach the kill target first.
